questions.q: Implement Bubble Sort in JavaScript.
Implement the 'merge' function for Merge Sort (Merge two sorted arrays).
Calculate the frequency of each character in a string.
Compress an input string using character counts (Run Length Encoding).
Efficiently merge two sorted arrays (One-liner approach).
Sort array of fruits by the second character (and remove duplicates).
Validate an IPv4 address without using regular expressions.
Check if two strings are anagrams (without using sort).
Extract text from a numbered list string.
Find pairs in an array that sum to a target (Brute Force).
Group values by key from an array of objects.
Implement Run Length Encoding with count preceding the character.
Increment each element in an array recursively (without loops).
Count occurrences of a value (e.g., 5) in a nested array recursively.
Implement a closure-based groupBy function.
Check if a string is a palindrome.
Calculate the factorial of a number (Recursive).
Generate the nth Fibonacci number.
Find the maximum number in an array.
Reverse a string without using built-in reverse().
Implement FizzBuzz.
Remove duplicates from an array.
Flatten a nested array of any depth.
Capitalize the first letter of each word in a string.
Find the longest word in a sentence.
Check if a number is prime.
Find the intersection of two arrays.
Implement a Debounce function.
Implement a Throttle function.
Implement a deep clone function.
Implement Array.prototype.map polyfill.
Implement Array.prototype.filter polyfill.
Implement Array.prototype.reduce polyfill.
Implement a function to flatten an object.
Implement a Curry function.
Implement Promise.all polyfill.
Find the missing number in an array of 1 to N.
Check if brackets are balanced.
Rotate an array k times.
Move all zeros to the end of the array.
